name: election-app
description: Election Forum Application - Political Party Platform

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run copy-build
scripts.copy-build: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp -r client/dist/* public/
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.start: npm run build:all && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy' && git push origin main

author: Baivab Bidari
